ovdesc.p: Table to define the routing of orders between dealer desks.

desc.p: The key, a valid SC.DEALER.DESK id and a 10 character alpha numeric text separated by "-".
System populated field, will be either ACTIVE or INACTIVE denoting the rule status.
The dealer desk the orders are to be re-routed to. Must be a valid SC.DEALER.DESK id.
Turn on or off the routing rules, can be START or STOP.
Specifies which transactions are to be re-routed, can be either ALL or NEW.
Multi-language description of the routing rule.
The segment from which orders are to be routed from. Must be a valid SC.DEALER.DESK.SEGMENT.
